meanings.definition: A newly established business, typically small in size.
meanings.sent1: Many startups in our town focus on technology.
meanings.sent2: The startups in the city are known for their innovative ideas.
meanings.sent3: The startups decided to have a race to see who could grow the fastest.
meanings.sent4: Her startup was like a tiny seed that grew into a flourishing tree.
meanings.sent5: The world of startups is like a bustling marketplace full of new opportunities.

meanings.definition: The action or process of setting something in motion.
meanings.sent1: The startups of the project were slow but steady.
meanings.sent2: His startups in the company always led to successful outcomes.
meanings.sent3: The startups of the toy cars made them zoom across the room.
meanings.sent4: Her idea was the startup that ignited a chain reaction of creativity.
meanings.sent5: The startups of the gears in the clock made time tick away.
